game.name: Piece of Lambda
game.shortDescription: What if “Page of Lambda” had been made into a game? A dramatic RPG about love and friendship nurtured through travel. This is a fan-made game. It has nothing to do with NIJISANJI or ANYCOLOR Inc.
game.shortDescriptionEn: What if “Page of Lambda” had been made into a game? A dramatic RPG about love and friendship nurtured through travel. This is a fan-made game. It has nothing to do with NIJISANJI or ANYCOLOR Inc.
